name: Big Shot Espresso Stout
description: A favorite of many coffee-loving beer drinkers, Big Shot Espresso Stout boasts about a shot of espresso in every pint. Twisted Pine teamed up with popular Amante Coffee in Boulder to produce what Amante co-owner and founder Greg Buchheister calls "the most perfectly balanced buzz." The earthy, dark chocolate flavors of the Amante Espresso blend to the flawless balance of the beer.
